Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IEffect, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: North leads into the stronghold. South is the road back to the Adventurer's Guild.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the north, a great archway leads deeper into the mountain. To the south is the exit from the stronghold.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The hall terminates in grand archways to the north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Grand archways lie on the north and south walls. To the west lies a small side-chamber.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A door leads to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The hall terminates in grand archways to the north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Great double doors made of oak, both open, lie to the east and west. Archways lead north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hall runs east and west, with a set of double doors on the east end and wide marble staircase leading down on the west end.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Wooden doors lie at the west end of the hall and on the south wall. A wide marble set of stairs, at the east end, leads up. Another hall branches off to the north.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is the door to the north.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is the door to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a door at the north of the hall and a door in the middle of the east wall. To the south lies another hallway.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is the door to the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is the door to the south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The hall terminates in grand archways to the north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Grand archways lead away north and south. A set of oak double doors are visible to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A great archway leads south and a massive set of double doors is on the north wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only apparent exits are a set of double doors to the south and smaller door to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A set of narrow stairs on the north wall lead down into darkness. To the west there is a small iron door. To the east lies the secret entrance from the King's quarters.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is a door to the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the west end is a set of large double doors. On the east end, the hallway opens into a large room.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A door lies to the south and an open hallway leads west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are doors to the north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A door is present on the north wall and a set of double doors occupies the west wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Double doors exit out of this room to the east and west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The east end of the hall ends in a set of large oak double doors. The west end opens up into a well-lit chamber.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is a hallway leading east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A narrow stone staircase leads up from this room. On the east wall is a small iron door.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is a dark tunnel leading south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The only exit is the stairs leading down back into the heart of the mountain.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A stone staircase leads up to the south and a rough, broken tunnel leads north into what appears to be a natural cave system.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A wide corridor leads east. A great stair leads down and bright sunlight can be seen at the landing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A great stair leads up into the mountain. A crude stone-paved path leads down the mountainside into the forest below.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A path leads south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: When you put on the glasses, your vision is unchanged. However, you sense powerful magic that might enable you to see things you normally would not.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small burrowed-out tunnel leads away to the north. A large hole in the ceiling leads back up to the forest clearing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small tunnel leads south and the large set of stone stairs leads down.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The stone stairs lead up. There are hallways leading away to the east and west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A hallway leads away to the west. Massive double doors adorn the southern and eastern walls.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A hallway leads away to the east. Grand archways exit to the south and the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Grand archways exit to the north and the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Grand archways exit to the south and to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Grand archways exit to the north and to the east. A huge set of double doors adorns the southern wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A huge set of double doors exits to the north.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you start to enter the ominous forest, you are suddenly overcome with fear and cannot proceed! Would the other adventurers in the Guild think you a coward for avoiding this evil forest?

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you enter the very deep pit to climb down, you begin to realize just how sheer the sides are. You suddenly lose your grip and fall to your death!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you begin to climb down the very deep pit, your magical Boots of Levitation slowly and gently deliver you safely to the bottom!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your magical Boots of Levitation float you back up the shaft to the top of the pit!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a loud crackle of thunder and the air all around you explodes with clouds of thick sulfuric smoke!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The scroll reads, "Wizard's Knock Spell. Casting requires these spell components: Ruby stone, Residuum Powder, Dragon Spice and Kingswort Weed. Mix components into cauldron and enchant, 'Knock Nikto Mellon' then cast a Power spell."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The spell components in the cauldron begin to fizzle and crackle!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A sudden burst of magical energy springs from the cauldron and leaps to the portcullis! The magical lock on the portcullis is lifted and you may now pass.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Lich looks at you with its piercing yellow eyes and says, "My name is Sharruk. I am imprisoned in this temple via powerful magic. If you will free me, I will give you a gift of amazing power. All you have to do is say, 'I will free you'."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sharruk says, "Good! The magic words to break the spell that binds me are 'Barada lhain'. Say these words and you will be rewarded!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: When you speak the magic words, Sharruk pauses for a moment as if waiting for some revelation. Then he smiles in a menacing way and thanks you for freeing him. True to his word, he removes a magical helm from his head and gives it to you.*056

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "This Wizard's Helm will make your Blast spell far more deadly. It will allow it to pierce magical shields and defeat those who normally cannot be touched by magic or weapon." he says. "Now, begone from this place and allow me to continue my work!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer blocks your spell with a magical forcefield!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You try to finish the spell but suddenly your mind is befuddled!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer dodges your spell by teleporting across the chamber!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You try to finish the spell but suddenly feel drained of magical energy!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: --- The Necromancer dodges the attack by teleporting across the chamber!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: --- The attack is interrupted by a wall of magical force!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: --- The attack is broken by a blast of repulsive energy from The Necromancer!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: --- The Necromancer blinks out of existence for a second and the attack meets nothing but air!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You feel a sudden strong gust of wind.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A loud howl echoes off in the distance.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A strange sensation of fear suddenly overcomes you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your skin crawls with fear in this evil place.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a terrible wailing sound from far away.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer chants some arcane words and you find yourself drained of magical energy!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer blasts you with a lightning spell!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer blasts you with a fireball spell!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer blasts you with a necrotic spell causing your flesh to rot!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer utters some arcane words and summons a fire demon!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer utters some arcane words and summons a hell hound!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The Necromancer utters some arcane words and summons a demonic serpent!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The sign says, "Tangledoom Forest."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: tome. **044

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Boots of Levitation

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: *** UNUSED ***

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: unique mechanics like scaled monster toughness, and a powerful villain with complex behavior. Original Eamon Deluxe adventure EDX-24 by Derek C. Jeter. Eamon CS port by Michael Penner.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are milling about the Hall of Free Adventurers when the burly Irishman approaches. "A raven just arrived carrying a message for you," he says grimly. You take the piece of parchment from him and read the hastily scribbled letter. It is from **083

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: your brother, Jollifrud, who lives in the wealthy city of Fahrnor.*084

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: He states that a terrible menace has haunted a long-abandoned mountain fortress, known as Kahr-Dur, that overlooks the town. This unnamed menace has been quietly kidnapping the city's denizens during the night which has led to a general state of **085

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: fear and anxiety. Even worse, Jollifrud's daughter Lady Mirabelle is among those who have been seized. He begs you to journey to Fahrnor and help him rid the city of the great evil once and for all. Your brother was once a great adventurer but **086

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: has since retired after making his fortune plundering the great haunted tombs of the kings of old. The chance to stand next to him again in glorious battle is very tempting indeed.@@PB**087

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You decide to set out for Fahrnor to help your brother and, after a week's journey on horseback, you arrive. A sense of doom pervades the city. Homes and shops are shuttered up and the usual bustle expected of such an opulent metropolis is nowhere **088

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: to be found.*089

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Jollifrud greets you at the gates to his spacious home. He says there is no time to waste and you both set off for Kahr-Dur to confront its resident horror...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: LARGE OVEN.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: See EAMON CS 1.6 NEW COMMANDS for additional details.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: floor and you can GET ALL.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: to remove from or add to the container.

Collection.name: FreeUids
